name: consent
label:English(en): Respondent Consent

name: Your_participation_i_ther_on_your_opinion
label:English(en): Your participation is entirely voluntary, and even if you agree to take part, you are still free to withdraw before, during or after the interview. In addition, should you not wish to answer any particular question or questions, you are free to decline. All answers are strictly confidential and you will remain anonymous. With your agreement, we may audio record the interview and quote some of what you say in our report, but we will do so in a way that ensures that it cannot be ascribed to you. Your name will not be linked with the research findings and will not be identifiable in the report that results from the research except in an Annex at the end of the final report that lists all the informants who have contributed to the mid-term evaluation. Axiom ME will keep your information and will integrate you in others database of respondents which can be contacts during our verification (quality assurance) or for others surveys, until you express otherwise by contacting our team by phone or by email. It should be noted that AXIOM ME will not share your information beyond AXIOM ME but some of our team members can contact you to verify the occurrence of interview and our researchers could recontact you to build further on your opinion.

name: Consent
label:English(en): I agree to take part in this interview.

name: Consent1
label:English(en): I appreciate the objectives of the research and how my information and opinion will be used.

name: Consent2
label:English(en): I know how to contact Axiom ME to limit or cancel my information.

name: Consent3
label:English(en): I understand that my personal information used for QA purpose only will not be shared with any party out of Axiom ME.

name: Consent4
label:English(en): I agree that you may contact me in the future to gather feedback on this research.

name: Consent5
label:English(en): I agree to having my words used as quotes in the final report, and I understand that my words will be anonymized so that it will not be possible to ascribe any of my comments to me.

name: Consent6
label:English(en): I am of the same mind to having my name and institution included in an annex at the end of the final report that lists the informants who have contributed to this evaluation.

name: fs
label:English(en): Food Insecurity Coping Strategies

name: householdhunger
label:English(en): Household Hunger Scale Module(HHS indicator)

name: hh1
label:English(en): G1) In the past [4 weeks/30 days], was there ever no food to eat of any kind in your house because of lack of resources to get food?

name: hh2
label:English(en): G2) How often did this happen in the past [4 weeks/30 days]?

name: hh3
label:English(en): G3) In the past [4 weeks/30 days], did you or any household member go to sleep at night hungry because there was not enough food?

name: hh4
label:English(en): G4) How often did this happen in the past [4 weeks/30 days]?

name: hh5
label:English(en): G5) In the past [4 weeks/30 days], did you or any household member go a whole day and night without eating anything at all because there was not enough food?

name: hh6
label:English(en): G6) How often did this happen in the past [4 weeks/30 days]?

name: rcsi
label:English(en): rCSI indicator

name: fs_att
label:English(en): H) Over the past 7 days, how many days has your household had to:

name: fs_att1
label:English(en): a) Rely on less preferred and less expensive foods?

name: fs_att2
label:English(en): b) Borrow food, or rely on help from a friend or relative?

name: fs_att3
label:English(en): c) Purchase food on credit?

name: fs_att4
label:English(en): d) Gather wild food, hunt, or harvest immature crops?

name: fs_att5
label:English(en): e) Consume seed stock held for next season?

name: fs_att6
label:English(en): f) Send household members to eat elsewhere?

name: fs_att7
label:English(en): g) Send household members to beg?

name: fs_att8
label:English(en): h) Limit portion size at mealtimes?

name: fs_att9
label:English(en): i) Restrict consumption by adults in order for small children to eat?

name: fs_att10
label:English(en): j) Feed working members of HH at the expense of non-working members?

name: fs_att11
label:English(en): k) Reduce number of meals eaten in a day?

name: fs_att12
label:English(en): l) Skip entire days without eating?

name: HDD
label:English(en): Household Dietary Diversity Indicator for Measurement of Household Food Access

name: HDD_note
label:English(en): I) Now I would like to ask you about the types of foods that you or anyone else in your household ate yesterday during the day and at night

name: hhd1
label:English(en): a) Any [INSERT ANY LOCAL FOODS, E.G. UGALI, NSHIMA], bread,rice noodles, biscuits, or any other foods made from millet,sorghum, maize, rice, wheat, or [INSERT ANY OTHER LOCALLY AVAILABLE GRAIN]?

name: hhd2
label:English(en): b) Any potatoes, yams, manioc, cassava or any other foods made from roots or tubers?

name: hhd3
label:English(en): c) Any vegetables?

name: hhd4
label:English(en): d) Any fruits?

name: hhd5
label:English(en): e) Any beef, pork, lamb, goat, rabbit wild game, chicken, duck, or other birds, liver, kidney, heart, or other organ meats?

name: hhd6
label:English(en): f)  Any eggs?

name: hhd7
label:English(en): g) Any fresh or dried fish or shellfish?

name: hhd8
label:English(en): h) Any foods made from beans, peas, lentils, or nuts?

name: hhd9
label:English(en): i)  Any cheese, yogurt, milk or other milk products?

name: hhd10
label:English(en): j)  Any foods made with oil, fat, or butter?

name: hhd11
label:English(en): k) Any sugar or honey?

name: hhd12
label:English(en): h) Any other foods, such as condiments, coffee, tea?

name: fcs
label:English(en): Food Consumption Score for Measurement of Household Food Access

name: fcs_note
label:English(en): J) How many days over the last 7 days, did members of your household eat the following food items, prepared and/or consumed at home?

name: fcs1
label:English(en): a) Maize, maize porridge, rice, sorghum, millet pasta, bread and other cereals

name: fcs2
label:English(en): b) Cassava, potatoes and sweet potatoes, other tubers, plantains

name: fcs3
label:English(en): c) Beans, Peas, groundnuts and cashew nuts

name: fcs4
label:English(en): d) Vegetables, leaves

name: fcs5
label:English(en): e) Fruits

name: fcs6
label:English(en): f)  Beef, goat, poultry, pork, eggs and fish

name: fcs7
label:English(en): g) Milk yogurt and other diary

name: fcs8
label:English(en): h) Sugar and sugar products, honey

name: fcs9
label:English(en): i)  Oils, fats and butter

name: fcs10
label:English(en): j)  Spices, tea, coffee, salt, fish power, small amounts of milk for tea.
